Title: Hungry Ghosts
Writer: Joe Gayton (created by), Tony Gayton (created by), Jami O'Brien, Miki Johnson, Max Hurwitz (staff writer), Miki Johnson (staff writer)
Actors: Anson Mount, Colm Meaney, Christopher Heyerdahl, Robin McLeavy
Plot: Cullen and Mei take a dangerous journey through the California wilderness, escorting precious cargo. Eva nurses Louise back to health.
